duration.name: Duration
duration.desc: Duration of the spin animation in seconds (0.1s-10s).

blob.name: Blob
blob.description: Makes the file squishy like a blob.

squishy.name: Squishy
squishy.description: Makes the file squishy with a wobbly animation effect.

bouncy.name: Bouncy
bouncy.description: Makes the file bounce around on a transparent background.

circle.name: Circle
circle.description: Makes the file move in a circular motion.

fileWidth.name: File Width
fileWidth.desc: Width of the file in the animation.

fileHeight.name: File Height
fileHeight.desc: Height of the file in the animation.

infinity.name: Infinity
infinity.description: Makes the file move in an infinity symbol motion.

fileWidth.name: File Width
fileWidth.desc: Width of the file in the animation.

fileHeight.name: File Height
fileHeight.desc: Height of the file in the animation.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Creates a transition between various media files.

files.name: Files
files.desc: The set of files to transition to.

transition.name: Transition
transition.desc: The type of transition to apply (default: fade).

duration.name: Duration
duration.desc: Duration of the transition in seconds (max 10).

waitMode.name: Wait Mode
waitMode.desc: The mode the wait between transitions should be handled.

waitUntilEnd.name: Wait Until End?
waitUntilEnd.desc: Whether to wait until the end of the previous file before transitioning.

fadeAudio.name: Fade Audio?
fadeAudio.desc: Whether to fade audio between transitions.

waitUntilStart.name: Wait Until Start?
waitUntilStart.desc: Whether to wait until the start of the next file before transitioning.

tween.name: Tween
tween.description: Creates an animation with tweening effects on a file.

files.name: Files
files.desc: The set of files to be animated.

width.name: Width
width.desc: Width of the output canvas in pixels.

height.name: Height
height.desc: Height of the output canvas in pixels.

stretchAngle.name: Stretch Angle
stretchAngle.desc: Causes the element to be scaled after rotating.

keyframes.name: Keyframes
keyframes.desc: The keyframes for each of this animation's tween.

f.name: File
f.desc: The index of the file that's being tweened.

t.name: Time
t.desc: The timestamp to start applying the tween.

o.name: Opacity
o.desc: Opacity of the element, from 0 to 1.

colorize.name: Colorize
colorize.description: Adjust the colors of a file using either color curves or a tint overlay.

color.name: Color
color.desc: RGB color for the file (0-255 for each channel).

mode.name: Color Mode
mode.desc: The color adjustment mode to choose.

desaturate.name: Desaturate?
desaturate.desc: Desaturate the input file before colorizing it.

rainbow.name: Rainbow
rainbow.description: Applies a rainbow effect to the file.

pseudocolor.name: Pseudocolor
pseudocolor.description: Applies a pseudocolor effect to the input file using the specified color preset.

trim.name: Trim
trim.description: Trims a file between specified timestamps.

loop.name: Loop
loop.description: Loops the input file a specified number of times.

times.name: Times
times.desc: Number of times to loop (2-100, default: 2)

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Offsets the file's playback by the specified timestamp.

playback.name: Playback
playback.description: Apply a playback effect to the file. (reverse, boomerang, etc.)

crop.name: Crop
crop.description: Crops the file according to specified dimensions.

cropratio.name: Crop Aspect Ratio
cropratio.description: Crops the file to a specific aspect ratio.

originX.name: Horizontal Origin
originX.desc: Where to anchor the crop horizontally.

originY.name: Vertical Origin
originY.desc: Where to anchor the crop vertically.

perspective.name: Perspective
perspective.description: Changes the perspective of a file by specifying new corner positions.

stretch.name: Stretch to Fit
stretch.desc: Stretches the file beyond its original bounds.

interpolation.name: Interpolation
interpolation.desc: The type of interpolation for the perspective correction.

tlX.name: Top-Left X
tlX.desc: X coordinate for top-left corner (pixels or %)

tlY.name: Top-Left Y
tlY.desc: Y coordinate for top-left corner (pixels or %)

trX.name: Top-Right X
trX.desc: X coordinate for top-right corner (pixels or %)

trY.name: Top-Right Y
trY.desc: Y coordinate for top-right corner (pixels or %)

blX.name: Bottom-Left X
blX.desc: X coordinate for bottom-left corner (pixels or %)

blY.name: Bottom-Left Y
blY.desc: Y coordinate for bottom-left corner (pixels or %)

brX.name: Bottom-Right X
brX.desc: X coordinate for bottom-right corner (pixels or %)

brY.name: Bottom-Right Y
brY.desc: Y coordinate for bottom-right corner (pixels or %)

contract.name: Contract
contract.description: Contract the area of a file by a multiplier.

enlarge.name: Enlarge
enlarge.description: Enlarge a file by a multiplier.

expand.name: Expand
expand.description: Expand the area of a file by a multiplier.

scale.name: Scale
scale.description: Scale a file to specific dimensions.

shrink.name: Shrink
shrink.description: Shrink a file by a multiplier.

pixenlarge.name: Pixel Enlarge
pixenlarge.description: Enlarges pixel art using specialized algorithms.

blend.name: Blend
blend.description: Combines two files using a blend mode.

overlay.name: Overlay
overlay.description: Overlays one file on top of another.

base.name: Base File
base.desc: The base media file that will have another file overlaid on it.

overlay.name: Overlay File
overlay.desc: The file that will be overlaid on top of the base file.

originX.name: Horizontal Origin
originX.desc: The horizontal anchor point for the overlay (left/center/right).

originY.name: Vertical Origin
originY.desc: The vertical anchor point for the overlay (top/middle/bottom).

x.name: X Offset
x.desc: Number of pixels to offset the overlay horizontally from the origin.

y.name: Y Offset
y.desc: Number of pixels to offset the overlay vertically from the origin.

width.name: Width
width.desc: Width of the overlay in pixels or percentage (e.g. 100 or 50%).

height.name: Height
height.desc: Height of the overlay in pixels or percentage (e.g. 100 or 50%).

keepAspectRatio.name: Keep Aspect Ratio?
keepAspectRatio.desc: Whether to maintain the original aspect ratio (increase/decrease).

start.name: Start Time
start.desc: When to start showing the overlay (timestamp in hh:mm:ss format).

end.name: End Time
end.desc: When to stop showing the overlay (timestamp in hh:mm:ss format).

mask.name: Mask
mask.description: Applies a mask to a file.

base.name: Base File
base.desc: The base file to apply the mask to.

mask.name: Mask File
mask.desc: The file to use as the mask.

keep.name: Keep Mode
keep.desc: Whether to keep white areas instead of black areas (inverts mask).

x.name: X Offset
x.desc: Horizontal offset from origin position in pixels.

y.name: Y Offset
y.desc: Vertical offset from origin position in pixels.

width.name: Width
width.desc: Width to resize the mask to (pixels or percentage).

height.name: Height
height.desc: Height to resize the mask to (pixels or percentage).

keepAspectRatio.name: Keep Aspect Ratio?
keepAspectRatio.desc: How to handle aspect ratio when resizing (increase/decrease).

stack.name: Stack
stack.description: Stacks a file multiple times horizontally or vertically.

count.name: Count
count.desc: Number of additional copies to stack (1-100).

merge.name: Merge
merge.description: Merges two files together either vertically or horizontally.

swap.name: Swap?
swap.desc: Swap the order of the files.

blur.name: Blur
blur.description: Applies a blur effect to the file.

rotate.name: Rotate
rotate.description: Rotates the file by a certain angle.

alphaextract.name: Alpha Extract
alphaextract.description: Extracts the alpha channel (transparency mask) from an image.

caption.name: Caption
caption.description: Adds a white box caption to the file.

text.name: Text
text.desc: The text to display in the caption.

color.name: Text Color
color.desc: RGB color for the text (0-255 for each channel).

bgColor.name: Background Color
bgColor.desc: RGB color for the background (0-255 for each channel).

font.name: Text Font
font.desc: Font to use when rendering the text.

meme.name: Meme
meme.description: Add meme captions (top and bottom text) to a file.

topText.name: Top Text
topText.desc: The text to display at the top of the meme.

bottomText.name: Bottom Text
bottomText.desc: The text to display at the bottom of the meme.

color.name: Color
color.desc: RGB color for the text (0-255 for each channel).

borderColor.name: Border Color
borderColor.desc: RGB color for the text border (0-255 for each channel).

font.name: Text Font
font.desc: Font to use when rendering the text.

motivator.name: Motivator
motivator.description: Creates a motivational poster with the file.

topText.name: Top Text
topText.desc: The large text that appears at the top (in caps).

bottomText.name: Bottom Text
bottomText.desc: The smaller text that appears at the bottom.

color.name: Text Color
color.desc: RGB color for the text (0-255 for each channel).

bgColor.name: Background Color
bgColor.desc: RGB color for the background (0-255 for each channel).

topFont.name: Top Text Font
topFont.desc: Font to use when rendering the top text.

bottomFont.name: Bottom Text Font
bottomFont.desc: Font to use when rendering the bottom text.

tenorcaption.name: Tenor Caption
tenorcaption.description: Adds a Tenor-style caption to the top and bottom of a file.

topText.name: Top Text
topText.desc: Text to display at the top of the image.

bottomText.name: Bottom Text
bottomText.desc: Text to display at the bottom of the image.

color.name: Color
color.desc: RGB color for the text (0-255 for each channel).

borderColor.name: Border Color
borderColor.desc: RGB color for the text border (0-255 for each channel).

font.name: Text Font
font.desc: Font to use when rendering the text.

name.name: Name
name.desc: The name of the local command.

description.name: Description
description.desc: A short description of what this command does.

args.name: Arguments
args.desc: The arguments this local command accepts.

desc.name: Description
desc.desc: Description of what the argument does.

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type of the argument (string, number, etc.).

dft.name: Default Value
dft.desc: The default value if none is provided.

phrase.name: Trigger Phrase
phrase.desc: The phrase that will trigger this local command.

evalkeywords.name: Evaluate Keywords
evalkeywords.description: Parses and evaluates the provided keywords.

phrase.name: Phrase
phrase.desc: The phrase from which keywords will be extracted.

encodingPreset.name: Encoding Preset
encodingPreset.desc: The preset used for encoding. Slower presets provide better compression.

times.desc: Number of times to repeat the phrase.

rawrepeat.description: Repeat a phrase multiple times, processing keywords each time.

phrase.desc: The phrase to repeat, with keywords allowed.

times.desc: Number of times to repeat the phrase.

random.description: Generates a random number within a range.

arg.description: Returns the raw value of a specific argument.

name.desc: The name of the argument to return.

command.description: Executes a command and returns its output.

name.desc: The name of the command to execute.

args.desc: The raw arguments to pass to the command.

declare.description: Declares a new variable with a static value.

name.desc: The name of the variable to declare.

value.desc: The value to assign to the variable.

if.description: Conditionally evaluates a value based on a boolean.

condition.desc: The condition to evaluate as a boolean.

then.desc: The value if the condition is true.

else.desc: The value if the condition is false.

rawdeclare.description: Declares a variable whose value is evaluated as keywords.

name.desc: The name of the variable to declare.

value.desc: The variable content to evaluate when accessed.

return.description: Returns a final value from a keyword sequence.

returnfile.description: Returns a file as the final result.

path.desc: The path of the file to return.

name.desc: The name of the keyword to undeclare.

functions.noArgs: The set of values to evaluate from.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.none:
No tasks are
being processed yet...

gui.mainDescription: Select a command from the sidebar to begin.

help.noNewline: Don't add a newline to outputs.

commands.commandUsage: Show help for a specific command.

keywords.keywordUsage: Show help for a specific keyword.

functions.functionUsage: Show help for a specific function.

editors.title: %s Editor
editors.error: The argument "%s" has not been specified.

errorMessages.requiredArgument: A required argument has not been specified

success.title: Success
success.localCommandDesc: You can now use "%s" from the sidebar.
success.saveStateDesc: You can now load the current state of arguments from the saved JSON file.
